verses.translation: One demanding, demanded the chastisement which must befall
The unbelievers-- there is none to avert it--
From Allah, the Lord of the ways of Ascent.

verses.text_madani: تَعْرُجُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِي يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.translation: To Him ascend the angels and the Spirit in a day the measure of which is fifty thousand years.
Therefore endure with a goodly patience.
Surely they think it to be far off,
And We see it nigh.
On the day when the heaven shall be as molten copper
And the mountains shall be as tufts of wool
And friend shall not ask of friend

verses.text_madani: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ الْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِي مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: (Though) they shall be made to see each other. The guilty one would fain redeem himself from the chastisement of that day by (sacrificing) his children,

words.translation: They will be made to see each other

verses.translation: And his wife and his brother
And the nearest of his kinsfolk who gave him shelter,

verses.text_madani: وَمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.translation: And all those that are in the earth, (wishing) then (that) this might deliver him.
By no means! Surely it is a flaming fire
Dragging by the head,

words.translation: of the skin of the head

verses.translation: It shall claim him who turned and fled (from truth),
And amasses (wealth) then shuts it up.
Surely man is created of a hasty temperament
Being greatly grieved when evil afflicts him
And niggardly when good befalls him
Except those who pray,
Those who are constant at their prayer
And those in whose wealth there is a fixed portion.
For him who begs and for him who is denied (good)
And those who accept the truth of the judgment day

verses.text_madani: وَالَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: And those who are fearful of the chastisement of their Lord--
Surely the chastisement of their Lord is (a thing) not to be felt secure of--
And those who guard their private parts,

verses.text_madani: إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except in the case of their wives or those whom their right hands possess-- for these surely are not to be blamed,

verses.text_madani: فَمَنِ ابْتَغَىٰ وَرَاءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But he who seeks to go beyond this, these it is that go beyond the limits--
And those who are faithful to their trusts and their covenant
And those who are upright in their testimonies,
And those who keep a guard on their prayer,
Those shall be in gardens, honored.
But what is the matter with those who disbelieve that they hasten on around you,
On the right hand and on the left, in sundry parties?

verses.text_madani: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Does every man of them desire that he should be made to enter the garden of bliss?
By no means! Surely We have created them of what they know.

verses.text_madani: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: But nay! I swear by the Lord of the Easts and the Wests that We are certainly able

verses.text_madani: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: To bring instead (others) better than them, and We shall not be overcome.

verses.text_madani: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا وَيَلْعَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore leave them alone to go on with the false discourses and to sport until they come face to face with that day of theirs with which they are threatened;

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: The day on which they shall come forth from their graves in haste, as if they were hastening on to a goal,

verses.text_madani: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Their eyes cast down; disgrace shall overtake them; that is the day which they were threatened with.
